game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the abandoned temple.
game.description: The local historian has discovered the location of a lost artifact said to hold immense power. Your task is to navigate through the abandoned temple full of traps and puzzles and retrieve the artifact.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a rare weapon.

tasks.description: Travel through the thick forest to reach the entrance of the abandoned temple.
tasks.location: Abandoned Temple in the Northern Forest

tasks.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the inner chamber.
tasks.description: Solve the ancient riddles and find the hidden entrance leading to the inner chamber where the artifact is kept.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact and return safely.
tasks.description: Deal with the potential hazards that protect the artifact and return it safely to the historian.
tasks.location: Abandoned Temple and back to the Historian's House
